text: The Jersey Reds were an American basketball team based in North Bergen, New Jersey that was a member of the American Basketball League. The team was previously known as the Union City Reds. During the 1939/40 season, the team was merged into the New York Jewels on January 26, 1940. ==Year-by-year== {| class="wikitable" !Year !League !Reg.
